si.title: පුවරු 10 යි
body_lines: අයුක්ති සහගත ප්රතිලාභීන්ගේ ප්රතිලාභීන් පිළිබඳ වගකීම දරන අමාත්ය විජිත හේරත්ගේ උපදෙස් මත කමිටුවක් පත් කර තිබේ.
பௌத்தம், மதம் மற்றும் கலாச்சார அலுவல்கள், தேசிய ஒருமைப்பாடு, சமூக பாதுகாப்பு மற்றும் ஊடக அமைச்சின் செயலாளர்  ரஞ்சித் ஆரியரத்னவினால் நியமிக்கப்பட்ட இந்தக் குழுவில் 10 பேர் உள்ளடக்கப்பட்டுள்ளனர்.

en.title: 10 panel
body_lines: A committee has been appointed on the advice of Minister Vijitha Herath, who is responsible for investigating the beneficiaries of the unjust beneficiaries.
The committee appointed by the Secretary of the Ministry of Buddhism, Religion and Cultural Affairs, National Integration, Social Security and Media Ministry, Ranjith Aryaratne.

summary_lines: Committee formed: Minister Vijitha Herath investigates unjust beneficiaries. Appointed by Secretary of Ministry of Buddhism, Religion and Cultural Affairs, National Integration, Social Security and Media Ministry, Ranjith Aryaratne.
